ud5.3:6.5: anupubbiṃ kathaṃ → ānupubbīkathaṃ (bj) | anupubbīkathaṃ (si) | anupubbikathaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
ud5.3:6.8: nekkhamme → nekkhamme ca (bj, sya-all) | nikkhame ca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ud5.3:9.2: acirapakkantaṃ suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ → atha kho suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ acirapakkantaṃ (bj) | atha kho suppabuddhaṃ acirapakkantaṃ (si) | atha kho suppabuddhaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
